Detailed Description

AISystem Implementation of the ISystem interface for generic AI functionality.

Member Function Documentation

pcstr AISystem::GetName ( void   )  [protected, virtual]

Implementation of the ISystem::GetName function. Gets the name of the system. Only custom systems can return a custom name.

pcstr - The name of the system.
